title: AMDâ€™s new Threadripper Pro 5000 WX-Series brings Zen 3 to Workstations
content:
Two years after the release of the original Threadripper 3000 Pro series, AMD is finally upgrading the lineup with a new set of workstation-focused processors. These new processors will be a part of AMD’s Threadripper Pro 5000 series, and they’re based on the company’s Zen 3 architecture. We have a total of five new SKUs,

The post AMD’s new Threadripper Pro 5000 WX-Series brings Zen 3 to Workstations appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the new AMD Threadripper Pro 5000 WX series workstation CPUs.
